faqs.Q: Where are the elements sourced from?
faqs.A: All elements are locally grown here in Pasadena

faqs.Q: Can I fuse two elements together to create gold?
faqs.A: While technically possible, we currently do not have the technology currently available to do fusion

faqs.Q: How long does it take for elements to arrive?
faqs.A: It can take up to 5 business days for elements to arrive

faqs.Q: Am I able to return my elements for a refund?
faqs.A: Elements are able to be returned for a full refund if returned within 30 days of purchase

faqs.Q: I'm ready to purchase some elements! Where can I do so?
faqs.A: Just head to our main page and we will be able to process your order!
